function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air quality and ventilation in built environments leading to increased transmission of infectious diseases like COVID-19.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and compromised public health.","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper ventilation systems and air quality monitoring, as well as regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Occupants of built environments, workers, and residents in urban areas.","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and local government authorities."},{"Description":"Close interaction between individuals and objects in the built environment leading to the transfer of infectious diseases through surfaces and shared spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and difficulty in enacting social distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of shared surfaces, promoting hygiene practices, and implementing social distancing measures within the built environment.","Technologies":"Cleaning and disinfection technology, touchless fixtures, and smart building technologies for monitoring occupancy and social distancing compliance.","People":"Occupants of shared spaces, co-workers, and individuals in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and facility operators."}]}
